MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Sealand Road, Wetherby Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.09am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32pm on 14th April 2021.
